titles.title: A bill to extend the temporary suspension of duty on C1-3 perfluoroalkyl perfluoromorpholine.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/7/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the temporary suspension of duty on C1-3 perfluoroalkyl perfluoromorpholine.
